description:
Lock the screen after a timer runs out. Setup a timer between one and 60 minutes. Once the timer runs out, the app will lock your device's screen. Features:
  • Simple and clean design
  • Lock screen after 1 to 60 minutes
  • Remembers last timer
  • Quick setting tile
  • Notification to stop, extend or reset timer
Permissions:
  • Device admin to lock the screen
